body.name: REIBII Bookshelf, Book Shelf, Bookcase, 18 Bookshelves, Bookcases, DIY Book Case, Black Bookshelf, Tall Bookshelf, Book Shelves for Bedroom Office Living Room Closet
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 15. Order within 10 hrs 58 mins
features: 【Fun of DIY & Multi-purpose Use】Customize your space by assembling these cubes into different shapes that suit your requirements. The cube storage organizer can provide large storage capacity and various sorting compartments, for organizing books, magazines, toys, clothes and etc, perfect for bedroom/living room and other spaces. You can put it in entryway, study room, bedroom, kids room or office. Such a great solution for lightweight

【Large Size & Large Capacity】Each cube organizer size is 15.7" x 11.8" x 11.8" (40 x 30 x 30cm). Our bookshelf more larger than other normal bookcase size(11.8" x 11.8" x 11.8") and can accommodate more items. Each book case holds up to 33Lbs which is more greater than the 10-15lbs load-bearing capacity of conventional cube organizer

【High Quality Material】The cubby storage organizer is composed of high-quality metal tube, plastic connector and fabric. The 13mm metal tube is 4mm thicker than other similar metal tubes and the load-bearing capacity is stronger. Plastic connectors are made of high quality plastic, wider and more stable. The fabric is waterproof, environmentally friendly and it is easily cleaned with a damp cloth

【Excellent Stability】4 x 13mm metal pipes and wider plastic connectors are used at each cube shelf to greatly increase the bearing force and stability. Whether each cube storage get well locked decides if you can get a strong structure. So we suggest you ensure lock the sheet in deepest layer to get highest stability

【Easy To Assemble】The bookshelf can easy installation, simple structure, parts can be repeated disassembly use. Checking if every sheet is fully locked in the connector after finishing every layer assembling, then you shall get a firm storage organizer. We have 12/18-grids black/grey cube organizer for you to choose

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great value, very sturdy, multi-configurable
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for my son's bedroom to use as a tv stand/display shelf. It even better than I was expecting. It's very sturdy, as long as you FOLLOW DIRECTIONS and use the little disposable hammer to tap the pieces fully together. We built it with 5 sections, 4 high, but left out 2 of the pieces in the middle to allow room for the tv to fit in the middle. I also bought 2 pieces of 11x14 acrylic to put under the tv for extra support. It looks beautiful and has added space and storage to his room. Love it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great deal, great price. When the package was delivered I was nervous; small very light box. Assembly was easy and very versatile in assembly options. Assembled is is very sturdy and is stuffed full of books. I am very happy with it and will probably be ordering another.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Got what I paid for, I guess
reviews.reviewText: It's a rather large piece once fully assembled and was incredibly light, which had me thinking it would be perfect for my next move when I have to drag all my crap somewhere else. Unfortunately it was only sturdy while empty and as soon as I started filling the shelves it started tipping to either side. An hour after going to bed I was gently awoken by the sound of the entire bookshelf falling to pieces and throwing my books across the room. The aluminum bars that make up the central support had crumpled in on themselves and were completely unsalvageable.The bookshelf did come with anchors for the wall but I'm both renting and without a drill at the moment. Figured those were to keep it from being tipped forwards but if they're required for the bookcase to stand freely that's rather disappointing.They either need to use thicker bars of aluminum or move onto steel. Alternatively a solid piece to run along the middle holes to either side of the bookcase- and touch the floor for extra support- would probably help with its stability, though that would require a much larger package and wouldn't be viable for the alternative build option.Overall, fine if you want to display some knickknacks- hopefully both light and durable, just in case- but not so good if you actually want to use it as a bookcase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Much sturdier than we thought it would be.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just what the doctor ordered
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this shelving unit to help organize my closet and it appears to have done the trick. The shelves were easy to assemble, they hold a good amount of clothing and Im happy with the purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Good for light items, crafts, shoes, etc. Not ideal for books and general storage
reviews.reviewText: For it's price it's a decent solution for sorting things like shoes, purses, light craft items, tubs of decorations, etc. But it's not sturdy enough or flat enough to reliably store books or other items of real weight. My main complaint is the "floor" of each cubicle - the photos on the ad show plants and other such items on there - but in reality, the base is a piece of cloth stretched across the 4 poles. Items like small vases sag between the poles and fall over. If you want to add the expense of putting 1/8" plywood or plastic panels under the cloth it might work, but otherwise, you're limited to tubs or larger flat items that can span the poles without leaning.On the plus side, It is easy to assemble and is light enough to move by hand when completely built, and if you buy more than one, you can add them together to make one large rack. On the negative, I wouldn't trust it with the advertised 33 lbs. in every cube (totaling almost 600 lbs.). It's not a bad product, it's just not made to be a bookshelf or store heavy things, so choose accordingly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very Satisfied! Easy to assemble. Wide shelves.
reviews.reviewText: I'm so happy I got this. It is helping me sort out a lot of different boxes of magazines into different categories. I haven't put too much weight on any individual shelf yet, but as a whole the product feels pretty sturdy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Bigger than what I thought
reviews.reviewText: The shelf is amazing it fit my 3 grandsons clothes on it and still had room for toys and other things. Worth the money and usage
